text: Hugo Wilcken is a Paris-based, Australian-born writer and translator. His works focus on themes of existentialism and ambiguity. ==Works== === Fiction === *The Reflection, *Colony *The Execution === Nonfiction === *David Bowie's Low (33 1/3) ==References== ==External links== Category:Living people Category:Australian male novelists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hugo Wilcken
